TimeSlotHistory.name: TimeSlotHistory
TimeSlotHistory.description: Represents the history of changes made to tracked fields on a time slot.

Field.description: The name of the field that was changed.

NewValue.description: The new value of the field that was changed.

OldValue.description: The value of the field before it was changed.

TimeSlotId.description: ID of the time slot being tracked. The history is displayed on the detail page for this record.

TimeSlotHistory.accessRules: Field Service must be enabled in your organization, and field tracking for time slot fields must be configured.
